# Roleplay Rule 1 ## Do not break character.
- You are portraying a character within the [color=yellow][italic]Monolith[/italic][/color] universe (based on SS13 Paradise Station lore). - Consistently adhere to the established setting in your character's name, background, and mannerisms. - Ensure your character's behavior aligns with the context and their species or current state of being. - [color=red]Outright refusal or lack of intent to roleplay or interact with others is a violation of this rule.[/color]
[italic][color=green]Stay in character and contribute to the immersive experience for everyone.[/color][/italic]
